content: Fix test isolation - mocks are leaking state between tests causing wrong function calls to be tracked
details: Test 'should get cached value successfully' shows mockRedisClient.get called with 'non:existent' instead of expected 'test:key'

content: Fix mock call expectations vs actual implementation - exists() returns 0 instead of expected 1
details: Delete operations fail because exists() calls are not hitting the right keys

content: Fix TTL test async/await issues - getting 'intermediate value is not iterable' error
details: TTL test has async promise handling issues causing test failure

content: Fix getOrSet cache hit/miss logic - cached values not being properly retrieved
details: Cache hit test returns fresh value instead of cached value indicating cache miss

content: Complete mock function call tracking - safeJsonStringify/Parse calls not matching expected parameters
details: Primitive values test shows wrong arguments being passed to stringify mock
